name: Jeremy (Final)
description:
Originally created for the Brackey's Game Jam 2022.1. This is the final version of the game with some edits and tweaks here and there based on feedback from the jam.

Theme: It is Not Real.

Jeremy lives alone in his apartment. He's not the brightest guy, but he has a big heart.

Help him achieve the basic necessities of living, Eating, Drinking, Sleeping, um... Urinating, Exercising, and engaging with his Community. It'll take you maybe 5  minutes tops to snoop around and puzzle it out.

There are 2 major optional secrets to find and maybe a half dozen minor ones. Happy Hunting!
